transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir very good morning, Manjeet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ha badhiya hu.
Executive: Sir ye na jo aapka pallets wala product tha to usko aapne bola tha ki usme bhi rakhna hai to usko abhi maine add kiya tha almost 10 products ko but sir ye jo pallets wala product tha na apna jisme lead consume kar rahe the to aapne bola tha ki usko bhi rakh sir to usko maine abhi almost 10 products kiya tha aapke catalog me but wo sab ke sab yaha se remove ho gaya sir to abhi aapne isko delete kiya hai kya apne end se?
Customer: Pallets ko maine delete kiya hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi mai confirm kar raha hu sir mai abhi add kar raha tha so almost maine 10 product add kiya hai sir but wo abhi mujhe show nahi ho raha hai to aapne apne end se remove kiya hai kya ye mai janna chah raha hu sir.
Customer: Ah, ek baat batao mujhe pallets ke product remove hue hai to usme aur pallets dikh rahe hai ya fir sare ke sare pallets wale product delete ho gaye?
Executive: Ek sir dikh raha hai supreme karke ek dikh raha hai baki sab hat gaya sir. Ek fir se abhi add hua hai roto molding warehouse storage pallet. I think aapke se bhi koi is catalog pe kaam kar rahe hai to shayad unhone remove kiya hoga baki ko aur ek ko add kiya hoga sir.
Customer: Ha wo aapne jo dala hoga na wo relevant nahi wo uske liye wo Noida me baitha hua hai mera chota bhai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To wo shayad hoga mujhe nahi malum usi ne kiya hoga aur abhi wo add kar raha hoga aapne jo kuch dala hoga wo relevant product line me nahi hoga isliye hata diya hoga.
Executive: Accha accha. Actually maine isliye add kiya tha na ki us consume ho rahe the aur jab aap se confirmation leke ki to bola tha aapne ki isme karna hai to isliye maine add kiya tha.
Customer: Aap pallets me kuch bhi mat karo pallets jo hai na pallet wala product me kuch bhi mat karo wo jo bhi karta hai wo apna wo karta rahega uska naam Vinit hai Balshastri.
Executive: Ha ji ha ji sir aapne ek baar number bhi mujhe share kiya hua tha.
Customer: Ha to wo apna jo bhi karega karta rahega usse aap mera jo ye hai na safety locker aur strong room door home locker isko strong karo isko strong isliye mai baar baar bol raha hu ki is saal maine man bana liya hai actually ki ab mujhe IndiaMART trade India nahi chahiye ye jo char panch lakh rupaye saal ka kharch karta hu na isko mai apne upar kharch karu exhibition me jau to isse jyada bahut bahut accha matlab kama lunga yaha de kar ke koi fayda nahi hai aap visibility badi acchi de rahe ho lekin customer maan hi nahi raha hai ki mera ye product accha hai to mai kya karu visibility leke nahi chahiye fir mujhe jaha jaha customer manega wahin jaunga fir wahin bechunga.
Executive: Nahi bilkul sir at the end sabko result chahiye ROI chahiye tabhi aap invest karenge. And definitely sir alag alag sources ko bhi use karna sahi hota hai jaise aapne bataya exhibition ko uske alawa online sources bhi aapka better hai but hum try kar rahe hai sir ki jo bhi yaha se hum better aapke efforts dal kar ke aapko provide kar paye to uske liye hum kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Aapke hai na customers jo IndiaMART product jo hai engineering product wo lete hai lekin ye jo tijori wala jo customer hai na wo bahut hi stupor jahil hai bahut hi anpad gawar ghamandi isko jyada kuch samajhne nahi hota paise ki afford hai usko waha pe paisa kam hai isliye 20-25000 ka maafi karna samajhna nahi aur is field me chuki apni bahut jyada to isliye jo hai IndiaMART yaha pe successful nahi ho raha hai customer ko lakh samjhao ya to wo bahut ghatiya kharidega ya fir wo godrej ka kriya kharidega. Godrej ka ghatiya bolne ka matlab hai ki five star hotel me gaye aur chai pee ke aa gaye aur bahar teen mar pit rahe hai ki hum to five star hotel me gaye the hum to bahut photo woto selfie selfie khich ke aa gaye.
Executive: Samajh raha hu sir brand name ke sirf brand value ke upar purchase karte hai to uski baatein karna aap bilkul mai samajh raha hu aap jo safety locker strong room door ka keyword aise hi mat karo ki alag alag product kar do aap jo hai so apna IndiaMART pe jo sabse jyada keyword search ho raha hai wo sara inka dekh lo aur wo likhne ke baad uska ranking kar lo us ranking ke hisab se jaise aapne 6 feet ki tijori me 50 likh diya.
Customer: Godrej utna pandit kar sakti hai hum godrej jaise chutiye nahi hai na godrej ka naam se bik jata hai lekin hum wo nahi karna chahte hai to waha pe 160 liter likh diya aapne to 160 liter ka tijori wo thode 6 feet ka usme pani rakhoge kya doodh rakhoge 160 liter liter nikaloge to wo 1500 2000 liter ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul sir. Usko na mai update kar raha hu ki usko kaise jo hai hamare update kar raha hu lekin fir mai wo thak gaya hu mai actually bahut jyada thak gaya hu tab tak aapka intezar kar raha hu ki ye 6 mahine khatam ho jaye aur mai tension free ho jau ki sabko bhaga dijiye 5-5 lakh rupaye website banwao just dial do India do aur mushkil se home locker wala just dial wale ne home locker diya hai puna ka local to iske liye to mai 5 lakh rupaye kharch nahi kar raha hu na bhai 5 lakh rupaye me mai 3 lakh rupaye kharch karunga exhibition me to exhibition me baithe 10 mil jayenge 10 order matlab 20 lakh ka order mujhe mil jayega.
Executive: Nahi sir actually yaha pe exhibition me alag hota hai aur yaha pe aane ka sir aapka main motto main purpose ye hota hai jo real time pe searches hote hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapka samajh mai samajh raha hu aap kya bol rahe ho mai baar baar wahi bol raha hu ki aapke yaha pe aane ka jo all India visibility hai us visibility se order convert nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Bilkul sir bilkul sir conversion chahiye na bhai mujhe visibility nahi mujhe order paisa chahiye paisa.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul.
Customer: Paisa chahiye wo chahe jaha se ho.
Executive: Ha ji bilkul sir. Sir abhi na jo hamare end se jo jo cheeze hum logo ne discuss kari thi update karne ke liye us pe already mai kaam kar hi raha hu under process hai aur sir ye abhi aapka steel security safe hai na to iska three four leads consume karna tha maine whatsapp pe bhi aapko share kiya hua tha aap ek bar lead section open karke aur usme aapko search karni hai steel security safe face aur uska jo leads aayenge aapke product se related usme three four leads aap consume kar lijiye aur us customer ko reply kar dijiye sir because ye category recently hum logo ne update kiya hua tha sir baki baki thi preeti mam se to aur ye abhi inactive pada hua hai to is karan se iski visibility jo apna preferred city hai waha pe nahi aa raha hai sir to three four lead aap ek bar consume kar lenge to wo active ho jayega sir aapko search karna hai steel security safe by lead section me aur usse related jo leads aayenge us pe three lead consume karne hai aur us customer ko reply bhi karni hai sir. Theek hai baki rest of the things mai apne end se update kar raha hu jab ek bar sara kuch mai kar lunga jo mujhe lagega maine apne end se kar liya to dobara se mai aapke sath connect ho kar ke review kar lunga ek bar so that ki isme kuch incorrect rahega to use hum dobara se correct kar paye sir.
Customer: Theek theek theek.
Executive: Okay sir. Okay thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Pallet products removed from catalog.

- Visibility not converting into orders.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of customers.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed to check on pallet product removal.

- Executive advised to consume leads for steel safe.

- Executive assured to review and correct any issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to consume 3-4 leads for steel safe.

- Executive will update from his end.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, buyleads, subscription, product, visibility
